sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
falls
ali
falls down
, se naglo pomika proti tlom ali pade na tla.

seg.quote: The cup fell from her hand and shattered on the floor.
Tears fell from Mother's eyes.
Part of the ceiling fell down.
The snow was still falling.
He was rushed to hospital after a 40-foot fall.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj, kar stoji pokonci,
falls
ali
falls down
ali
falls over
, se po nesreči premakne ali ga nekdo porine, da obleži na tleh.

seg.quote: She lost her balance and fell.
He tripped and fell down.
...a falling tree.
...to rescue people trapped inside fallen buildings.

sense.def:
Kadar človek na visokem položaju
falls
, nenadoma izgubi svoj položaj. Kadar neki kraj
falls in a war or election
, sovražnik ali druga politična stranka prevzame oblast v tistem kraju.

seg.quote: The regime had fallen.
Greater London will fall to Labour.
This led to the Government's fall.
...the fall of France.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
falls in amount, value, or strength
, se zmanjša njegova količina, vrednost ali moč.

seg.quote: The value of the dollar has fallen.
Their voices could be heard rising and falling.
...a fall in moral standards.
Some nations were uneasy about their falling birth rates.

sense.def:
Kadar noč ali tema
falls
, postane temno in se začne noč.

Kadar svetloba ali senca
falls on something
, tisto prekrije.

seg.quote: A shadow fell over her book and she looked up.

sense.def:
Kadar naše oči
fall on something
, nekaj nenadoma zagledamo ali opazimo.

seg.quote: His gaze fell on a small white bundle.
An expectant hush fell on the gathering.

sense.def:
Z besedo
to fall
povemo, da nekdo ali nekaj preide v drugačno stanje. Na primer, kadar nekdo
falls ill
, zboli.

seg.quote: After a while I fell asleep.
The crowd fell silent.
He fell in love with her.

sense.def:
To fall into a particular group or category
pomeni pripadati neki skupini ali kategoriji.

seg.quote: Human beings fall into two types.

sense.def:
Slap lahko imenujemo
the falls
.

seg.quote: ...Niagara Falls.

sense.def:
The fall
ima enak pomen kot
autumn
;

Kadar nekaj
falls apart
, se razlomi na kosce, ker je staro ali slabo izdelano.

seg.quote: ...cheap beds that fell apart.

sense.def:
Kadar neka organizacija ali sistem
falls apart
, postaneta neorganizirana in nesposobna za učinkovito delovanje.

seg.quote: The nation is falling apart.

sense.def:
To fall back
pomeni hitro se odmakniti od nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: I saw my husband fall back in horror.

sense.def:
To fall back on something
pomeni nekaj narediti ali uporabiti, potem ko je vse drugo spodletelo.

cit.quote: zateči se, zadovoljiti se, sprijazniti se

seg.quote: Often you give up and fall back on easier solutions.

sense.def:
To fall behind
pomeni ne napredovati ali iti naprej tako hitro kot drugi.

seg.quote: ...children who fall behind with their reading.

sense.def:
To fall for someone
pomeni začutiti močno privlačnost do nekoga in ga začeti ljubiti.

seg.quote: Richard fell for her the moment he set eyes on her.

sense.def:
To fall for a lie or trick
pomeni verjeti laži ali potegavščini;

cit.quote: nasesti, biti opeharjen, iti (komu) na led

seg.quote: The working class were not going to fall for this one.

sense.def:
Kadar streha ali strop
falls in
, se sesede in pade na tla.

To fall in with an idea, plan, or system
pomeni sprejeti zamisel, načrt ali sistem in se ne potruditi, da bi jih spremenili.

seg.quote: Instead of challenging the lie, she falls in with it.

sense.def:
Kadar stopnja, količina ali obrok nečesa
falls off
, se zmanjša.

seg.quote: We knew that the numbers of overseas students would fall off drastically.

sense.def:
Kadar človekov las ali zob
falls out
, se zrahlja in loči od telesa.

seg.quote: After about two weeks, the victim's hair starts to fall out.

sense.def:
To fall out with someone
pomeni spreti se z nekom, da nista več prijatelja.

seg.quote: I've fallen out with certain members of the band.

sense.def:
Kadar neki dogovor
falls through
, se ne uresniči.

seg.quote: We wanted to book a villa but it fell through.
It fell to Philip to act the part of host.
